title: Adore
description: Dean and I have always fallen together, but this time we might fall apart.Finally I have everything...almost. With a rambunctious toddler, a crazy workschedule, and too many responsibilities, I'm guilty of neglecting my passionate, intimate marriage.And my hot professor husband is not at all happy about that.Dean's brother Archer is fighting to convince stubborn Kelsey to marry him -- so how can I take my own marriage for granted?Refusing to let me put "us" on the back burner, Dean is determined to lure me into lusty new adventures. At first, I'm more than happy to go along.Then he gets an opportunity that could change our lives...and I'm forced to confront the frightening idea of my husband going places where I can't follow.***Spiral of Bliss Reading Order:AROUSEALLUREAWAKENARRIVEBREAK THE SKYADOREALWAYS
author: Nina Lane
